pp2.6:0.3_0: Sixteen on what is known as the six fields.
pp2.6:1.1_0: Now, the person who himself understands the truths of principles, the power of wisdom, and the development of all meditation. They regard themselves the power of great psychic power.
pp2.6:2.1_0: Now, the person who himself understands the truths of good principles and bad, but doesn’t attain the development of the qualities that lead to awakening. They don’t experience perfect awakening.
pp2.6:3.1_0: Take the case of the person who, having directly known for themselves the truths of the teachings, gains making an end of suffering in this very life. They’ve gone forth from the lay life to homelessness.
pp2.6:4.1_0: Now, the person who, having realized the truths of the teachings and isn’t penetrated, does not rejoice, and make an end of suffering in this very life. But the Realized One is not who has reached the level of perfected ones, the fully awakened Buddha.
pp2.6:5.1_0: However, the person who, having directly known for themselves and realized the supreme state of existence, but they don’t reach the end of suffering in this very life, nor will I see any non-returners.
pp2.6:6.1_0: Of the, the person who, having understood the truths of India, doesn’t favoritism, and who doesn’t make an end of suffering in this very life.
